page.title: 06LOCAL SERVICES IN FERNESS
page.content: PAPERS- Daily papers are brought by postbus. Sunday papers are collected from Nairn on a rota system by locals. COAL- Lorry delivers coal and calor gas weekly (fornightly in summer). MILK- Delivered 3 times weekly from Nairn. BINS- Weekly refuse collection. MAIL- Twice daily from Nairn by postbus. Daily delivery to households. HEALTH CARE- Doctors' clinics and local hospitals around 12 miles distant. General hospital 24 miles. FIRE AND POLICE- Stations serving Ferness are in Nairn. TRANSPORT- Bus and railway stations in Nairn or Forres (11 miles). Local airport is at Dalcross (Inverness) 24 miles away. TELEPHONES- Most houses have private telephones. There is 1 public phone in the village.
